credit_line: Gift of Susan W. Paine in honor of Stephen D. Paine, Class of 1954
title: Persepolis Study (from the "Emborados Series")
description: One of eighteen abstract drawings from the Emborados Series. Views of the temple and ruins of the city of Persepolis have similar shapes that are echoed here.
inscriptions: verso l.c. on frame in ink: 2132
